name: Fallen Flames
description:
this game has you escaping an old cave/prison where you battle indestructible creatures called "feeders," you are playing as "Sam." a human looking creatures called a "Baradonian." Sam stands at 8'0 ft and has a body with similar propriety's to bubble gum. Sam can stretch his limbs in anyway. he uses this plus simple physics to break out fo the prison and fight the big boss. 

movement- A= Left    D= Right   space= Jump

attack= P

pause= esc    and   un-pause= Q

you must run threw the the lower level of the prison and collect 4 keys, once collected you can go up to the top and go threw the big door. but once you go threw it you will have to fight the big boss, the captain.
